EMP 30 SSE OJC VIH FAM 35 SSE FAM POF UMN BVO 20 SSW PNC LTS 75 NW
ABI 40 N 6R6 40 ENE MRF TCC CAO DDC EMP.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 70 SSW 6R6 20 E ALM
